snippet.title: Path of the Warrior | Announce Trailer | Oculus Quest
snippet.description:
Beat'em up like never before in Twisted Pixel's Path of the Warrior, only on Oculus Quest. Now you can step into the epic tradition of fighting games, where your fists and the environment are your tools to unleash a hurricane of mayhem. With hilarious interactions and intuitive combat mechanics, you'll embark on a fist-first tour of destruction through this throwback revival that could only happen in VR. 
 
Learn more about Path of the Warrior here: https://ocul.us/2YH7hsw
 
Stay connected to Oculus Gaming: 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/OculusGaming 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/OculusGaming 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/oculusgaming/
